name: M.A.X.: Mechanized Assault & Exploration
description: A level of complexity unseen in contemporary strategy gamesChoose either simultaneous or turn-based game mode to fit your personal preferencePlay as one of 8 human clans and use dozens upon dozens of land, sea and air units

recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 600 MB available space
